product_name: SportHill Nomad Half-Zip Top - Men's - Special Buy
long_description: Designed to keep you comfortable during workouts when you need a little extra warmth, the men's SportHill Nomad Hafl-Zip Top features moisture-wicking, quick-drying fabric to fend off the chills. Four-way stretch maximizes comfort and freedom of motion. Thumbholes let you secure the sleeves over hands and wrists for warmth. Front zip allows easy ventilation. Reflective logos increase visibility. Special buy.
short_description: Designed to keep you comfortable during workouts when you need a little extra warmth, the men's SportHill Nomad Hafl-Zip Top features moisture-wicking, quick-drying fabric to fend off the chills.
